properties.description: This pipeline is to join Customer and Address tables, and copy CSV into ADLS

activities.name: Join Customer and Address tables
activities.description: This pipeline is to join Customer and Address tables, and copy CSV into ADLS

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT A.CUSTOMERID, A.FIRSTNAME, C.AddressLine1||' '||AddressLine2||' '||City||' '||StateProvince||' '||CountryRegion||' '||PostalCode
FROM SALESLT.CUSTOMER A JOIN SALESLT.cUSTOMERAddress  B
ON A.CUSTOMERID = B.CUSTOMERID  
JOIN SalesLT.ADDRESS C ON B.ADDRESSID = C.ADDRESSID;

properties.description: This Pipeline is created to copy Customer, Product, CustomerAddress tables to CSV files in their own locations
Create a pipeline named 'GetMetaData_Example' to fetch the list of all the files available inside the ADLS folder.
Create a pipeline name 'Foreach_Example' to copy the Customer & Customer address table data into ADLS using the one copy activity.
Create a pipeline that first checks whether the Customer.csv file is available in the folder location. If it is available it will copy the file data to the Customer Table.
4. Create a pipeline that will create the incremental pipeline using the table instead of HighWaterMark File.
